BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_PGI_HR_NOC (NUM_NOC_ID, STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE, DT_DATE_OF_REQUEST, STR_NOC_ORDER_NO, DT_NOC_ORDER_DATE, STR_NOC_REMARKS, STR_NOC_ISSUED_BY, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_PGI_HR_NOC SET DT_DATE_OF_REQUEST=?,STR_NOC_ORDER_NO=?,DT_NOC_ORDER_DATE=?,STR_NOC_REMARKS=?,STR_NOC_ISSUED_BY=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_NOC_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_PGI_HR_NOC SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_NOC_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
